answerText: ephemerides [or ephemeris; accept things like ephemeris charts or ephemeris tables][10] This astronomical coordinate, measured as an hour angle, is analogous to longitude on earth. This coordinate plus declination constitute the equatorial coordinate system in which ephemerides are typically reported.

subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name these tables that give the locations of celestial bodies at various points in time to high accuracy and precision.
